data.title: Family

data.text: I had a Brilliant time with my family at the parrotel hotel, the animation team were brilliant! I would Highly recommend this holiday, the  pool is beautiful with a good little water park that the kids loved ! Helpful staff and the hotel was nice and clean.
data.title: Perfect for families

data.text: Our stay at this wonderful resort was GREAT. The stuff were helpfull, their kindness was top notch and the kids enjoyed their time. I recommend it to all.  We enjoyed really our stay their from 21st to 25th of March. The cuisine was delicious, with plenty of options and the night shows were awesome. Parrotel, hopefuly for our next trip, the maintenance at water park will be done, so we can enjoy the views
data.title: A trip to remember to Sharm El Sheikh, in the nicest water parks hotels, with 5 kids, it was worth every dime we spent..

data.text:
After a few hiccups I can honestly say that I am very pleased to give this hotel 9/10 review. 
At first I had doubts on arrival but as days went by these are my positive points. 
First and foremost if you have issues report to the following managers Mr Adel who looks after Rooms and housekeeping does a superb service making sure his staff clean the rooms perfectly. 
Mr Harun - front office reception - super helpful and pleasant to deal with. 
Mr Sayed - food and beverage manager very organised and happy to take criticism and fix problems. 
Mohamed Emad - restaurant manager is always at hand to help. He has very good staff who he managers perfectly. 
These guys get things sorted and can make your holiday most enjoyable. I missed dinner due to a late pick up from my excursion and manager done a complementary room service. Wow absolutely amazing. The selection of food was so delicious and large portions. Including desert. Very pleased. 
If you ask you will be given a lovely holiday. 
Everyday the service is improving. 
Pools - The is a large selection of swimming pools including a heated pool located closet to the restaurant. To get to the large selection of Water slides has a free taxi service running through out the day. It's very convenient. 
Pool stuff are very helpful and don't even get tips. I did tip them because they made my pool experience very comfortable and relaxing. 
The food is really good at the buffet with a large selection of everything. 
If you ask the waiters to get you drinks they are very helpful rather than standing in a queue. Don't forget a tip goes a very long way. 
Rooms
Are kept clean and tidy. Very hard working staff again a small tip goes a long way. 
John at the little shop is a lovely friendly guy. His prices are decent and very good basic stuff to offer. 
Negatives 
I had a few but disappeared as so many things improved and changed my negative thoughts to positive. 
There has to be at least one negative but I am sure the managers will change it. Bar near the disco area should be open at night so there is less queues at the main bar. 

Don't hesitate to book. It's a very nice hotel with lots of positives. I only wish I could talk to the mosquitos and tell them to stop bitting lol. 
Wish you all a lovely holiday.
data.title: Definitely very good
